price: On reče: “Zar da vam, pored Allaha, tražim drugog boga, a On vas je nad svim drugim svjetovima odlikovao?!”
arabic: قَالَ أَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ أَبۡغِيكُمۡ إِلَٰهٗا وَهُوَ فَضَّلَكُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla aghayra al-lahi abghīkum ilāhan wahuwa faḍḍalakum ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
